name: Pikupiku Sentaro: Puzzle de Gohan!
overview: Based on a manga and anime series the Playstation game is a 2d puzzle game in which the players can choose between different characters to play and the ending and story will be different depednding of the character that he choose. There are different game modes: vs and story mode. The gameplay is about running around a circle field meanwhile putting pieces and try to hit the enemy with the combinations. The player that finish with more hearts and the end of the time limit wins.
